props.Lore: There are many who aren't content with the lack of privileges for the "High Race" in the Allkingdom and the passive subservient attitude of the ruling Eagle Lords.
props.Name: Ulraim Menloris
props.Description: Ya rigid, ser!

props.Lore: Any who is born in one of the Allkingdom's crown-cities may be called this, but in practice, only those with proper education and without too much provintial blood - be it the dark Fingravian hue or the reddish Halmar - will quality as People of King's Realm.
props.Name: Aeilar Gorthiod
props.Description: A perfectly balanced, perfectly "flexible" background which has the benefit of deep role-play somewhere behind it! Just savor the sound of it...

props.Lore: There are many who aren't content with the lack of privileges for the "High Race" in the Allkingdom and the passive subservient attitude of the ruling Eagle Lords.

props.Description: In a realm dominated by underworld magi guilds, those without magical education often seek to prove themselves invaluable as discrete and determined wizard killers.

props.Lore: Despite their small numbers and lack of interest in the world's affairs, Skyguard knights are still feared enough so that few ever dare cross the borders of Eagle Realm with steel in hand.
props.Name: Eagle Realm Skyguard
props.Description: A perfect Knight that fights with Honor. Hardly as efficient as a hired thug or a brawling dwarf, but you get to be a good person in the end.

props.Deity: Sun God;Death Gorger;World Tree;Queen of Lust;Annihilator;Lord of Decay;Wild God;Warmaster;World Tree;Allfather;Sky Queen;Night Lord;Crimson Queen;Arachnia;Dark Gods;Fide Arcanum;
props.Name: Easterling Wanderer
props.Description: In the Eastern Realms, those who do not wish to associate themselves with any of the cults often choose to flee into the West.

props.Name: Nordheim Slayer
props.Description: Slayers are an elite caste in Nordheim society, charged with the destruction of giants, goblinoids and drakes that roam the Great Wilderness.

props.Deity: Three Divines;Witch King;Lord of Magic;Wraith God;Keeper of Twilight;Void Lord;Sky Queen;Allfather;Redeemer;Fide Arcanum;
props.Name: King's Realm Studiosus

props.Lore: Distant relatives of the Elders of Ulduin, the Storm Titan, Fingravians are known for their warrior honor, hunting skills and unpredictable temperament. Many of them renounced the legacy of the Allfather and went onto darker paths in search of glory and freedom...
props.Deity: Wild God;Night Lord;Lord of Decay;Arachnia;Allfather;Aspect of Life;Aspect of Darkness;Old Way;Dark Gods;
props.Name: Man of Wolf Realm

props.Name: Melthedor
props.Description: In a realm dominated by underworld magi guilds, those without magical education often seek to prove themselves invaluable as discrete and determined wizard killers.

props.Lore: Any who is born in one of the Allkingdom's crown-cities may be called this, but in practice, only those with proper education and without too much provintial blood - be it the dark Fingravian hue or the reddish Halmar - will quality as People of King's Realm.
props.Name: Arcturus
props.Description: A perfectly balanced, perfectly "flexible" background which has the benefit of deep role-play somewhere behind it! Just savor the sound of it...

props.Lore: Despite their small numbers and lack of interest in the world's affairs, Skyguard knights are still feared enough so that few ever dare cross the borders of Eagle Realm with steel in hand.

props.Description: A perfect Knight that fights with Honor. Hardly as efficient as a hired thug or a brawling dwarf, but you get to be a good person in the end.
